column1: # ESP32-S3 Partition Table for T-LoRa Pager K257
# 16MB Flash: app (3MB) + OTA (3MB) + NVS (20KB) + LittleFS (1.5MB) + coredump
# - "spiffs" label is used for LittleFS (backward compatible name)
# - App partitions: 3MB each (enough for LVGL + LilyGoLib + WebSocket)
# Remaining: ~8.375MB unused (can expand LittleFS if needed)
